text.section: Two or more candidates who have established separate campaign finance entities may form a slate.
After establishing a campaign finance entity in accordance with § 13-202(b) of this subtitle, a candidate may join a slate.

section.section: To join a slate, a candidate shall file a written notice with the State Board.

The notice shall specify:
the name of the slate that the candidate has joined; and
the date on which the candidate joined the slate.
